entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
